meanings.definition: A small amount or number of something scattered or dispersed.
meanings.sent1: I saw a sprinkling of stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: She added a sprinkling of sugar to her tea.
meanings.sent3: The sprinkling of confetti made the party even more festive.
meanings.sent4: The sprinkling of applause filled the auditorium.
meanings.sent5: The sprinkling of laughter echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: The act of scattering or dispersing something in small drops or particles.
meanings.sent1: After the rain, there was a sprinkling of water on the leaves.
meanings.sent2: The baker used a sprinkling of flour on the dough.
meanings.sent3: The sprinkling of paint on the canvas created a unique pattern.
meanings.sent4: The sprinkling of seeds in the garden promised a colorful bloom.
meanings.sent5: The sprinkling of sand on the beach sparkled in the sunlight.
